name: Hofstede-S1 Mining Laser
name_cn: 霍夫斯泰德-S1型采矿激光器
description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 1
Optimal Range: 15m
Maximum Range: 75m
Power Transfer: 1900
Resistance: -10%
Instability: -30%
Optimal Charge Window: +10%
Shatter Damage: +75%
All Charge Rates: +20%
Throttle Speed -50%
Extraction Throughput: 0.35 SCU/s
Consumable Slots: 2
Built with safety in mind, the Hofstede-S1 sacrifices range and focuses on dampening a deposit's instability to make it safer to mine. Miners looking to decrease the chance of a catastrophic explosion should turn to this reliable and affordable mining laser from Shubin.
description_cn:
制造商：舒宾星际(Shubin Interstellar)
物品类型：采矿激光器 
尺寸：1
最佳距离：15m
最大距离：75m
能量传输：1900
采矿抗性：-10%
不稳定性：-30%
充能绿区：+10%
爆裂伤害：+75%
总充能速率：+20%
过热速度：-50%
开采速率：0.35 SCU/秒
耗材插槽：2
出于安全考虑,霍夫斯泰德-S1型牺牲了射程,专注于降低矿石的不稳定性,从而更安全的采矿.希望降低采矿爆炸风险的采矿员们应该多多考虑舒宾星际提供的这种可靠且价格合理的采矿激光器.
